name: Etekcity Infrared Thermometer Laser Temperature Gun 774, Meat Food Candy Oven Thermometer for Griddle Accessories, Heat Gun for Cooking Refrigerator Tools, Adjustable Emissivity & Max Measure, Yellow
short_description: 𝐕𝐞𝐫𝐬𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐥𝐞 𝐓𝐨𝐨𝐥𝐬: Infrared technology allows you to measure various objects at home and outdoors; Use it for 𝒎𝒆𝒂𝒕, 𝑫𝑰𝒀 𝒄𝒂𝒏𝒅𝒚, 𝒐𝒗𝒆𝒏𝒔, 𝒈𝒓𝒊𝒍𝒍𝒊𝒏𝒈, 𝒇𝒐𝒐𝒅, 𝒄𝒐𝒐𝒌𝒊𝒏𝒈, 𝒂𝒖𝒕𝒐𝒎𝒐𝒕𝒊𝒗𝒆 𝒖𝒔𝒆, 𝑨/𝑪, 𝒓𝒆𝒇𝒓𝒊𝒈𝒆𝒓𝒂𝒕𝒐𝒓𝒔, etc.

𝐁𝐞𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐀𝐜𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐲: The Lasergrip's 12:1 𝒅𝒊𝒔𝒕𝒂𝒏𝒄𝒆-𝒕𝒐-𝒔𝒑𝒐𝒕 𝒓𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐 enables you to accurately measure temperatures from a comfortable distance. For best results, position the thermometer approximately 14.17 inches / 36 centimeters away from the target.

𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐨𝐟 𝐮𝐬𝐞: Scan the surface of your object, hold down the trigger of the thermometer gun, get temp anywhere within the range of -58°–842°F / -50°–450°C. Then watch as your result appears on the bright LCD display in less than half a second.

𝐁𝐫𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 & 𝐑𝐞𝐚𝐝𝐚𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲: Each infrared thermometer 𝒇𝒆𝒂𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒆𝒔 𝒂 𝒍𝒂𝒓𝒈𝒆, 𝒃𝒂𝒄𝒌𝒍𝒊𝒕 𝑳𝑪𝑫 𝒔𝒄𝒓𝒆𝒆𝒏, making it easy to read temperatures even in low light. With 2 AAA batteries included, powering up the thermal gun is a cinch.

𝐅𝐫𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐝𝐥𝐲 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧: The new Lasergrip displays 𝒓𝒆𝒂𝒍-𝒕𝒊𝒎𝒆 𝒕𝒆𝒎𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒂𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒆𝒔 𝒃𝒂𝒔𝒆𝒅 𝒐𝒏 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒂𝒗𝒆𝒓𝒂𝒈𝒆 𝒐𝒇 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒎𝒆𝒂𝒔𝒖𝒓𝒆𝒅 𝒔𝒖𝒓𝒇𝒂𝒄𝒆 𝒂𝒓𝒆𝒂. This means the reading you see reflects the average temperature within the circular area targeted by the infrared sensor — not a single point. It also features a 𝒎𝒂𝒙𝒊𝒎𝒖𝒎 𝒕𝒆𝒎𝒑𝒆𝒓𝒂𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒆 𝒅𝒊𝒔𝒑𝒍𝒂𝒚 for additional insights.
product_description: Etekcity Lasergrip 774 has one of the most classic designs among our infrared thermometer series. Very quality hand feeling, one button to measure, adjustment emissivity, and 2 common temperature units can fulfill the home-use needs. With a non-touch and a laser point switch design, you can measure hot or cold items at a suitable distance, such as the pizza oven, air conditioning/ AC, car engines, swimming pools, bath water, wine coolers, etc. Besides, an easy-use design also provides more convenient pet care, maintaining a comfortable temp environment for reptiles and hairless cats. Specifiction Temperature Range: -50℃ to 450℃/ -58℉ to 842℉ Distance Spot Ratio: 12: 1 Recommended Distance: About 36 cm/ 14 inch Emissivity: 0.1-1.0 Response Time and Wavelength: 0.5 seconds Repeatability: 1%/ 1℃ Units: ℃/ ℉ Batteries: 2 x AAA Batteries Product Dimensions: 6.14 x 3.15 x 1.57 inches Measurement Increments: ±2%Attention It's not for human use.

short_description: Temperature measurement range:-50℃-500℃ (-58℉-932℉）Display resolution: 0.1 ℃ or 0.1 ℉

[Emissivity:0.95 preset]Most organic materials and painted or oxidized surfaces have an emissivity of 0.95 (pre-set in the unit). Inaccurate readings will result from measuring shiny or polished metal surfaces. To compensate, cover the target surface with masking tape or flat black paint. Measure the tape or painted surface when the tape or painted reach the same temperature as the material underneath.
Automatic shutdown function (about 8 seconds）
[Power] AAA*2 batteries

name: Laser Infrared Thermometer Non-Contact Digital Temperature Gun, -58℉～1112℉(-50℃～600℃) IR Thermometer for Industrial, Kitchen Cooking, Automotive, HVAC (Not for Human Body Temp)
short_description: 🎁【High Accuracy】 DESOMIYE laser thermometer gun adopts the latest high-sensitivity temperature sensor, which can measure the temperature range of -50°C~600°C (-58°F~1112°F) in only 0.5 seconds. For best results, the reader should be 14 inches away from the object.

🎁【Wide Range of Applications】Infrared technology makes this temp gun convenient to measure the surface temperature of inanimate objects: cooking, baking, grilling, frozen food, fried food, car repair, completing HVAC projects, plantation, winemaking, water temperature measurement, appliances, etc.

🎁【Not Suitable for Humans】 This infrared thermometer gun is an industrial thermometer, it cannot be used to measure body temperature. The reading measured by the temperature measuring gun is the surface temperature of objects and liquids, and cannot measure the internal temperature, so the temperature of people or animals measured will be inaccurate.
🎁【Easy to Use】 Simply scan the surface of your object, hold down the trigger of the infrared thermometer gun, and release to get live temperature readings anywhere between -50°C~600°C (-58°F~1112°F).

🎁【User-friendly design】 With hold data function, unit switching (°C/°F), temperature calibration range between -3°C ~ 3°C. Each IR temperature gun has a large backlit LCD screen for easy temperature reading even in the dark, and 12 seconds auto-off to prolong battery life so you won't run out of power accidentally.
